contest-event.event-date: Oct. 16, 1948 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship On the Cornish Coast Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK Note: Henry Geehl was appointed referee. Prizes: 1st: 200 Guineas 2nd: 150 Guineas 3rd: 75 Guineas 4th: 50 Guineas The awards were made at the evening Festival Concert. The contest started at 12.00 noon May 17, 2010, 12:27 p.m. Oct. 14, 2011, 3:01 p.m. 1 Black Dyke Band Harry Mortimer 2 Cory Band Walter B.
